summary:
I am interested in jobs in the field of strategic marketing, market research, event management, corporate identities, marketing concepts and communication.

Experience in: 
marketing strategy, marketing communications, event marketing and management, customer relation marketing, B2B marketing, corporate identities, sales management, competitors analysis, market research, SWOT, business planning.

My competences are:
Creative, result driven and focused on efficiency, analyst, self starter, organization and planning skills, like to be challenged, enthusiastic and motivated.

profile_positions.description:
Teknor Apex is a global leader in custom compounding. The Europe Division is specialised in Thermoplastic Elastomers for Transportation, Consumer, Medical and Electrical applications.

- Development of segment specific reports around Sales Budgets, Realisations, Margins and Volumes and analysis and communiation of the results
- Responsible of the annual Marketing Budget and Marketing Planning
- Development and realisations of Marketing and Sales Campaigns
- Participation in Trade Shows 
- Updating and development of corporate and segment specific presentation, brochures and product sheets
profile_positions.title: Marketing Communication Officer

profile_positions.description:
Temporary job.
- Market and trend analysis new products and developments
- Coordination and analysis of accessory forecasting regarding new models
- Business planning, communication, follow up and evaluation of the 4 seasonal sales campaigns
- Coordination of the development of brochures and sales support material including design, photography, negotiation with design agencies and the distribution to the European Markets
- Set up and coordination of After Sales related communication to the European Market
- Support Marketing and Communication Manager during Special Projects, Developments and Management Reporting
profile_positions.title: Marketing Specialist a.i. via Limbourg & Partners

profile_positions.description:
MCL bv is a manufacturer of industrial equipment. It is part of A.Hak Industrie, a division of A.Hakpark.

- Managing annual marketing plan and budget
- Responsible for all promotional communication such as company presentations, corporate brochures, product leaflets, articles, and advertisements
- Organizing participation in Sales Events, Exhibitions and Customer Relationship Events
- Managing website content of MCL and A.Hak Industrie website
- Market analysis such as competitors, target groups, customers and market research
- Monthly analysis of customer relationship and sales activities and report on Key Performance Indicators
- Prequalification and providing information to (potential) customers about products and services, quotations and orders   
- Conducting Customer Satisfaction Survey

- Assisted in the development of the Strategic Growth Plan
- Adapted the CRM module in the ERP-system for managing customer relationship  and sales activities
- Developed new SWOT analysis by implementing various analysis, such as internal analysis, competitor’s analysis, market research, target group analysis and sales analysis
- Defining new Key Success Indicators, Product-Market-Combinations and new Key Performance Indicators
- Chair of project group for the organisation of the Visitors Day
profile_positions.title: Marketing Executive

profile_positions.description:
Interacting with customers. Providing information, offering quotations and guidance throughout the order process. Offering pre sales care.

I developed my sales and acquisition skills. Learned to work with tight deadlines and to work under pressure. It was very nice to work closely with customers.  Very good experience!
profile_positions.title: Sales Assistent

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the continuation and further development of sponsorship policy. As well as the organisation and coordination of participation on several events selected for sponsorship. Support of the Sales department such as mailings and managing Key Account information.
Besides these tasks I wrote a thesis about “Delivery of temporary water”, the improvement of the positioning of the product.

I worked at the Communication, Marketing and Sales department. During this period I gained good insights about strategic marketing and sales. I learned to communicate, coordinate and organise events.
profile_positions.title: Trainee Communication, Marketing and Sales
